docna.cdata!:
Zimbabwe - Rural Afforestation Project :
            Credit 1368 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Zimbabwe - Rural Afforestation
            Project : Credit 1368 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project would constitute a
            first phase in developing a rural afforestation program, and
            would build up the implementing agencies, collect
            socioeconomic and technical information, and test and
            develop appropriate afforestation policies. In addition, it
            would help to meet the demand for fuelwood and poles by
            setting up tree nurseries, plantations and demonstration and
            trial plots.
